title: DSL Basics Quiz
summary: Check your understanding of Sruja core syntax.

questions.prompt: Which elements define the main structure inside a system?
questions.explanation: Systems typically contain containers; containers can contain components; datastores model data storage.

questions.prompt: How do you declare a relation from Web to API?
questions.explanation: Use Source -> Target with an optional label string.
Use metadata { key "value" } entries for richer documentation.
